item.title: Kentucky Mom Shocked After Son Orders 70K Dum-Dum Suckers From Amazon
item.description: Holly LaFavers says she tried stopping 8-year-old Liam's order before the treats arrived but it was too late.

item.title: Woman Who Disappeared From Wisconsin 62 Years Ago Finally Found
item.description: Audrey Backeberg, who disappeared from Reedsburg in 1963 has been found safe in another state.
